body:
All submissions for this problem are available.

Given n and m, calculate 11 + 22 + 33 + ... + nn modulo m.

Input

The first line contains 1 ≤ t ≤ 10, the number of test cases. Then the test case definitions follow. Each test case is of the form: 1 ≤ n 1018, 1 ≤ m ≤ 200000

Output

For each test case simply write a single line containing the answer to the problem.

Example

Input:
6
1 100000
2 100000
3 100000
4 100000
5 100000
6 100000

Output:
1
5
32
288
3413
50069
languages_supported: C, CPP14, JAVA, PYTH, PYTH 3.5, PYPY, CS2, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, RUBY, PHP, GO, NODEJS, HASK, rust, SCALA, swift, D, PERL, FORT, WSPC, ADA, CAML, ICK, BF, ASM, CLPS, PRLG, ICON, SCM qobi, PIKE, ST, NICE, LUA, BASH, NEM, LISP sbcl, LISP clisp, SCM guile, TCL, kotlin, TEXT, SCM chicken, CLOJ, COB, FS
